name: Orange Boy (349769)
description:
Orange Boy is a 2D platformer game that I created using unity and photoshop. when putting this game together I had one of the Mario games in mind to help me create as well as give me an idea on what I want in my game. 

Orange Boy is just a little platformer game where you collect coins, and in the final level I made it a bit more challenging by adding an enemy that walks back and forth. But will orange make it to the end without loosing a peel.
